Upgrades.Name: Telekinesis
Upgrades.Description: The octopus teaches you how to use insight to move heavy objects. This will allow you to do basic manual labour such as mining

Upgrades.Name: Advanced Telekinesis
Upgrades.Description: Refine your control of Telekinesis, enabling you to manufacture more complex items

Upgrades.Name: Long Term Memory
Upgrades.Description: Enhances your knowledge of things over time, making your jellyfishs more effective

Upgrades.Name: Lightning Ability
Upgrades.Description: Allows you to use your insight to call a lightning strike. Useful to rapidly melt some sand into glass
